chunks.zh: 现在的社会为什么深情且专一会被称为舔狗
chunks.en: Why is being deeply in love and devoted called a 'simp' in today's society?

chunks.zh: 爱情不是爱的最纯粹，最轰轰烈烈吗
chunks.en: Isn't love supposed to be the purest, most passionate thing?

chunks.zh: 为何现在把不是两情相悦，单方面追求的行为叫做舔狗
chunks.en: Why is the act of pursuing someone who doesn't reciprocate, a one-sided pursuit, now called 'simping'?

chunks.zh: 有回报的才算爱情。
chunks.en: Love is only love if it's reciprocated.

chunks.zh: 舔狗一般是长期没有回报，甚至没有回应。
chunks.en: 'Simping' usually means a long-term lack of return, even lack of response.

chunks.zh: 现代社会时间紧任务重，做什么都讲效率，要求回报的，爱情也是，很难像书上说的”精诚所至金石为开“。
chunks.en: Modern society is short on time and heavy on tasks. Everything is about efficiency and demanding returns, including love. It's hard to believe in 'sincerity can penetrate metal and stone' as the books say.

chunks.zh: 网友认为你不值得，就骂你舔狗
chunks.en: If netizens think you're not worth it, they'll call you a 'simp'.

chunks.zh: 网友和你意见不一致，就骂你杠精
chunks.en: If netizens disagree with you, they'll call you a contrarian.

chunks.zh: 网友认为你用了贵的的东西，而他没这个需求，就骂你装 B
chunks.en: If netizens think you use expensive things that they don't need, they'll accuse you of showing off.

chunks.zh: 仔细想想，其实这些都骂得没道理，没有认识到人的多样性、价值观的多样性，反而追求自我中心化、单一化。
chunks.en: Thinking about it carefully, these insults are really unreasonable. They don't recognize the diversity of people and values, and instead pursue self-centeredness and homogenization.

chunks.zh: 我一直很反对这些做法。
chunks.en: I've always been strongly against these practices.

chunks.zh: 舔狗主要针对的是丢掉自尊作践自己，以此来希望感动对方这样的行为，总之爱人先爱己；
chunks.en: 'Simping' mainly refers to the behavior of losing self-esteem and humiliating oneself in the hope of moving the other party. In short, love yourself first.

chunks.zh: 舔狗一词可以说是相当准确了，想象一下你认识的狗看到你就一顿狂舔，你会把它当个人吗？
chunks.en: The term 'simp' can be said to be quite accurate. Imagine a dog you know licking you wildly when it sees you, would you treat it like a person?

chunks.zh: 对应的例子是前几天有个帖子，那个楼主对猫过敏，他老婆还舍不得把猫送走，这就是没把他当个人看，别说是老婆了，就是室友这么干我都会让他滚蛋，那个楼主明显没有这骨气，就是典型的舔狗。
chunks.en: A corresponding example is a post a few days ago where the poster was allergic to cats, but his wife couldn't bear to give the cat away. This is because she didn't treat him like a person. Not to mention a wife, even if a roommate did this I would kick him out. That poster obviously didn't have the guts, he's a typical simp.

chunks.zh: 因为当代国女不值得
chunks.en: Because modern Chinese women aren't worth it.

chunks.zh: 凡事有底线，只是专一的人不会被叫做舔狗。
chunks.en: Everything has a bottom line. Only people who are devoted but principled won't be called 'simps'.

chunks.zh: 舔狗说的是放弃自尊作践自己的人。
chunks.en: 'Simps' refers to people who give up their self-esteem and humiliate themselves.

chunks.zh: 而且舔狗不一定专一
chunks.en: And 'simps' are not necessarily devoted.

chunks.zh: 舔狗是丢掉自我后的单方面感动，深情是保留了自我之后的信任与尊重。
chunks.en: 'Simping' is one-sided 'moving' after losing oneself, while deep affection is trust and respect after retaining oneself.

chunks.zh: 因为大多数人不值得深情且专一
chunks.en: Because most people are not worth being deeply loved and devoted to.

chunks.zh: 因为很多人曾经 “单方面追求”，结果失败了，因此对这种行为产生了恨。
chunks.en: Because many people have had the experience of 'one-sided pursuit', which resulted in failure, and therefore developed hatred for this behavior.

chunks.zh: 感情箭头是单向的才是舔狗
chunks.en: A one-way arrow of affection is what makes a 'simp'.

chunks.zh: 纯粹的爱应该是基于双方的情感共鸣，而不是单方面的牺牲。
chunks.en: Pure love should be based on mutual emotional resonance, not one-sided sacrifice.

chunks.zh: 女神见帅哥第一面就开操，你当 atm 永远操不到
chunks.en: The 'goddess' sleeps with a handsome guy on their first meeting, and you, acting as an ATM, will never get to sleep with her.

chunks.zh: 爱别人首先爱自己先啊,有些人就是爱的太卑微把自己搞的什么都不是
chunks.en: Love yourself first before loving others. Some people love so humbly that they make themselves into nothing.

chunks.zh: 舔🐶没底线
chunks.en: 'Simps' have no bottom line.

chunks.zh: “深情且专一” 是在「恋爱和婚姻」中的美好品质
chunks.en: 'Deep affection and devotion' are beautiful qualities in 'love and marriage'.

chunks.zh: “单方面追求”，甚至都不能说两个人之间有什么关系
chunks.en: 'One-sided pursuit' may not even mean there is any relationship between two people.

chunks.zh: 对方默许你的追求行为，这可以是在考虑期的正常行为，也可能是在养鱼塘
chunks.en: If the other party acquiesces to your pursuit, this may be normal behavior during the consideration period, or it may be that they are just fishing.

chunks.zh: 对方反感还死缠烂打，这叫骚扰
chunks.en: If the other party is disgusted and you keep pestering them, it's called harassment.

chunks.zh: 如果明知道是备胎，甚至千斤顶，还愿意当 ATM ，这种贱骨头可之称为 “舔狗”，舔到最后一无所有
chunks.en: If you know you're a backup, even a jack, and are still willing to be an ATM, this kind of worthless person can be called a 'simp', and they'll end up with nothing.

chunks.zh: 多年为一家公司工作可以称为深情且专一
chunks.en: Working for a company for many years can be called being deeply in love and devoted.

chunks.zh: 多年为一家公司工作不发工资可称为舔狗
chunks.en: Working for a company for many years without getting paid can be called 'simping'.

chunks.zh: 舔狗是狗主要是丧失了独立人格，这个和深情且专一并没有什么必然联系。
chunks.en: 'Simping' is being a dog mainly because one loses one's independent personality. This has no necessary connection with being deeply in love and devoted.

chunks.zh: 有些人被骂舔狗是因为网友刻薄。
chunks.en: Some people are called 'simps' because netizens are mean.

chunks.zh: 有些人被骂舔狗就是他丧失了独立人格，他就是舔狗。
chunks.en: Some people are called 'simps' because they have lost their independent personality, and they are indeed 'simps'.

chunks.zh: 我也经常一个帖子骂了别人龟龟，另一个帖子说男方追求女方可以主动花点钱，但是我并不感觉自己分裂，就是单纯的具体情况具体分析。
chunks.en: I often call someone a turtle in one post, and then say that men pursuing women can actively spend money, but I don't feel like I'm splitting, it's just a simple analysis of the specific situation.

chunks.zh: 在追求的过程中 丧失了自我尊严 自我价值 自我意义的人  此时灵魂形态上已经四脚着地 成了一条狗  女人挥一挥手指头 轻声 啧啧~ 两字  就可以唤醒他的所有身体机能
chunks.en: A person who loses self-esteem, self-worth, and self-meaning in the process of pursuit, at this time, his soul is on all fours and becomes a dog. A woman waves her finger and softly says 'tsk tsk', which can awaken all his physical functions.

chunks.zh: 舔狗其实是一种自恋的表现
chunks.en: 'Simping' is actually a manifestation of narcissism.

chunks.zh: 舔狗是没有自尊的……
chunks.en: 'Simps' have no self-respect...

chunks.zh: 舔狗把女都沟了，剩下那些肯定有意见呀。
chunks.en: 'Simps' are getting all the girls, of course, the rest will have opinions.
